name: RateElert
description: Helps consumers find lower ins rates
overview:
RateElert.com helps US consumers shop for insurance and find the best insurance rates possible based on their unique situation. Every insurance company likes different risks so RateElert helps match you with the insurance company that has the best rates for YOU in your community. Experts agree the # 1 way to save money on your insurance is to get multiple rate quotes every year to make sure you are still getting the best bang for your buck. The Problem is most consumers simply do not have the time or remember to shop their insurance every year. Therefore, with RateElerts patent-pending Insurance NetShopper renewal reminder service you can relax because RateElert will automatically send you a eLert via e-mail or text message letting you know your current policies are up for renewal and its time to shop again. This way you are always getting the best insurance rates possible.

RateElert.com is the internet’s leading online insurance exchange that assists consumers with finding the right policy at the lowest rate possible, it’sâ€¦.. Insurance Shopping Made Easy!

Whether you’re looking for auto, home, life, health, or business insurance, RateElert can help.

Our unique marketplace concept was created especially to…

-Let consumers choose from up to seven competitive insurance rates from major, national, regional, and local carriers across the U.S. -Connect consumers with a network of insurance agents who can help you choose the right policy for your needs. Our Agents represent major insurance carriers nationwide, so whether you’re staying in town, or moving to another state, RateElert.com can match you with a local expert! -Provide a convenient ‘one-stop-shop’ destination for your insurance needs by giving you choices, convenience and value while finding the best insurance rate for you. -Allow subscribers to receive instant email and text message notifications and renewal reminders using the RateElert Insurance NetShopperÂ® service so they never have to rush to renew their insurance again, this way they have plenty of time to see if there are savings to be had by comparing rates from competing insurance companies .
